pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, September 4, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, September 4, 2016:

Hangzhou, People’s Republic of China

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will have a bilateral meeting with the President of Chad, Idriss Déby.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will be welcomed by His Excellency Xi Jinping, President of the People’s Republic of China, at the G20.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only
  • Coverage by host broadcast

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will take part in the Official Family Photo at the G20

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only
  • Coverage by host broadcast

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Opening Ceremony of the G20

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only
  • Coverage by host broadcast

3:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 working Session “Strengthening Policy Coordination and Breaking a New Path for Growth”

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Coverage by host broadcast

6:50 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will take part in the G20 Leaders and Spouses Family Photo

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only
  • Coverage by host broadcast

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the Welcoming Dinner given by the President and First Lady of the People’s Republic of China.

Closed to media.

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the Boat Tour on West Lake.

Closed to media.

9:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the Cultural Performance.

Closed to media.

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
